document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">Veins </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">other </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Flowers </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Scarlet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Flowers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Nature </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9c88ff">leisure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Terms </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">"Branch", </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">"Jugular". </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">pass, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">she </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">abides. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">conjugate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">Skill </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">While </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">She </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">creates </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">federates </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">syllable </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The veins of other flowers
